mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Sarah Tracy to George W. Riggs, 1860 September 26
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tracy, Sarah, 1820-1896
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Sarah Tracy, secretary, to George W. Riggs, treasurer, September 26, 1860. Philadelphia. Thousand dollar check received. Send Miss Cunningham $77 from portrait money. Encloses letter to Mr. Herbert, making arrangements for Baron Renfrew's visit to Mount Vernon. Asks him to be at Mount Vernon to aid Mr. Herbert in receiving Queen Victoria's son.
